Articles.Content:
I've had Kerbal since .17 but haven't registered for the forums until now.

Was always a space nerd, actually wanted to be an astronaut, went to space camp at KSC.

Learned that you had to be either an engineer (math = yuck) or military (I'm a lover not a fighter!) so became a physician instead.

Such a neat community on here - look forward to starting some of the challenges and network with fellow Kerbalnauts!
Welcome to the ksp forums, hope you are enjoying the game. Feel free to ask questions about gameplay here on the forums. We are happy to help.

Welcome to the community Vegasryn

Have fun letting your imagination take you to space, and fly safe
